title: Support main looking for Plat+ team
body: Hi, I'm a gold 4 support main currently, the highest I've been solo is Gold 1, I'm looking for a higher ranked team to join to help me to learn more and carry more games by myself. I find that I'm sort of plateauing in skill level right now, so yeah if anyone is willing to take me on, so that I can learn more, I'd be extremely grateful. Even if I'm just your substitute support. Thanks. IGN: Princess Candy
